title: TradeInformer.com
description: Site set up using Wordpress, working on site performance and reducing page load times. Currently working on migrating this site to a headless CMS using Next.sjs and GraphQL.
imageDescription: A screenshot of Sabrina's React weather predictor app

title: Weather Predictor
description: A psuedo scientific weather predictor - predict the weather based on the last 10 years of weather data. Data is sourced from open-meteo, geocoding from rapidAPI. Made with React and deployed on Render.
imageDescription: A screenshot of the React weather predictor app

title: Country App
description: A javascript country app using the REST countries API. Filter countries by population size, language or region. The map highlights to display the region and shows a card of statistics.
imageDescription: A screenshot of the Javascript country app

title: Activity Cat
description: An activity app using Bored API. Tell activity cat how many people there are and how much you would like to spend. The cat will reply with an idea.
imageDescription: A screenshot of the activity cat app using fetch and bored api

title: Magic 8 Ball
description: An interactive, responsive magic 8-ball with updated responses. Built with javascript and jQuery.
imageDescription: A screenshot of an interactive magic 8 ball

title: Pacman
description: A pacman game made with javascript. There is a scoreboard, bonus points and the ghosts get scared when pacman eats an apple.
imageDescription: A screenshot of a Javascript pacman game

title: Murder Mystery Invitation
description: A website invitation for a murder mystery Halloween party. Made with CSS3.
imageDescription: A screenshot of an interactive CSS3 envelope for a 1920s murder mystery party invitation.
